Room.Name: Level One Circular Hallway
Room.ShortDescription: This is the south side of the first level hallway that encircles the castle.
Room.LongDescription: Farther to the east you can see that the hallway turns sharply to the north, while to the west it continues a good distance. There is a small healing room for the infirm on the north side of the hallway, and a couple of healing mages can be seen inside.
